title: Understanding ASD Signs
text: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) can manifest in various ways in young children. Observing their interactions and focus can provide clues.

title: Focus and Interaction
text: Consider how the child's focus on objects might affect their interaction with people around them.

hintAnswer: his attention is so focused on the toy that he does not interact with people nearby
title: Analyzing the Child's Behavior
text: What does it indicate if a child is so focused on a toy that they do not interact with people nearby?
choices: his attention is so focused on the toy that he does not interact with people nearby
he shares his enjoyment with his mother
